steps.title: Begin by sketching a skeletal guideline to base your drawing off of.
steps.content: Begin by sketching a skeletal guideline to base your drawing off of. In this case, Medusa will be drawn with the torso of a woman and the tail of a snake.

steps.title: Use shapes as guides for your drawing as shown.
steps.content: Use shapes as guides for your drawing as shown.

steps.title: Sketch her upper body.
steps.content: Sketch her upper body. Remember that you're drawing a woman, so pay attention to proportions!

steps.title: Draw small snakes instead of hair on her head.
steps.content: Draw small snakes instead of hair on her head.

steps.title: Add accessories.
steps.content: Add accessories. You can stick with just jewelry here, or you can add armor , a sword , or a bow and arrow .

steps.title: Outline her with permanent media such as ink or paint.
steps.content: Outline her with permanent media such as ink or paint. Don't forget to erase your pencil guidelines.
